name: Omega Ceti Astralis
description:
In space, there are no words, just the lonely song of the space whale. 

A little meditative journey through space. Made for the June 2018 #bitsyjam. I recommend playing in full screen and with headphones.

Play using the arrow keys.

Song credit: "Jellyfish in Space" by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
